message.content: {"given_definition_quality":85,"better_definition":"these (used for multiple things or people close to the speaker)","sentence":"这些书好看。","image_prompt":"Soft apocalypse animation style. Several books are lying open and stacked on a simple table. The atmosphere is gentle and nostalgic, with soft lighting and faded colors. Small hints of a distant world outside the window, but focus is on the books. Visual emphasis on 'these' books.","sentence_translation":"These books are good to read."}
